description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end (part retrospective/part modified); rear roof extension (part retrospective/part modified), involving the reinstatement/reduction of the existing  roof ridgeline  to the original.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be completed within 4 months of the date of this permission.

REASON: In the interests of the character and visual appearance of the property and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2015) and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing titles: Proposed Elevation Alterations, Drawing Number 02, dated September 2016; Current & Proposed Plans, Drawing Number 03, dated September 2016; Planning, Design and Access Statement, dated 10/09/2016.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All Roof tiles to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the original roof, and those of the adjacent property.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of The London Plan (Consolidated 2015)) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2013)

| All other external materials, apart from those materials mentioned under Condition 3 of this approval, shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4, 7.6 of the London Plan - Consolidated (2015)
